title: Does Anyone Know Why We Can No longer Purchase The Dawnbringer Riven Chroma?
body:
Does Anyone Know Why We Can No longer Purchase The Dawn-bringer Riven Chroma?
Its would really annoy me if i were to never get the chroma and the icon and what exactly 
would be the purpose/reason to take out of the token store.

because as of the moment i am pretty upset as i am a riven main and didn't know this was gonna happen.
and i don't think most of us did know.{{champion:32}}

replies.body: Don't worry a rioter said in a post on r/rivenmains that it would be up in around a week, along with the Ahri emote. Apparently they changed the color scheme from purple to teal, but the purple scheme made it to live servers.
